General.Name: Guangdong Homa Appliances Co Ltd
General.Description: Guangdong Homa Group Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells exports refrigerators in China and internationally. It also produces and sells small and other household appliances, and kitchen and bathroom appliances, as well as spare parts of various household appliances. In addition, the company wholesales, import, and export refrigerators. Guangdong Homa Group Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 2002 and is headquartered in Zhongshan, China.
General.Address: No. 54 North Dongfu Road, Zhongshan, China, 528427
